```{r}
check_stock <- c(
  "NEBNext® Companion Module v2",
  "Ligation Sequencing Kit",
  "LongAmp Hot Start Taq 2X Master Mix",
  "Qubit 1X dsDNA HS Assay Kit"
)

equipment_maybe <- c(
  "Gyro™ Microcentrifuge, fixed speed"
)

purchase_list <- c(
  "16S Barcoding Kit 24",
  "MinION Flow Cells",
  "DNA/RNA Shield Lysis Tubes (Microbe)",
  "Quick-DNA Fecal/Soil Microbe Miniprep",
  "Rapid Barcoding Kit 24",
  "UVC Sanitizer Ozone Box",
  "BeadBug™6 Microtube homogenizer",
  "mini16X thermal cycler",
  "MinION Mk1d Sequencer"
)
```



```{r}
purchase <- budget %>%
  filter(Name %in% c(purchase_list, equipment_maybe, check_stock)) %>%
  group_by(Category, Price, Supply, Manuf, Cat, Name, Link) %>%
  summarize(N     = sum(N)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(N = if_else(Cat == "MIN-101D" | Supply %in% c("DNA Decontamination System", "Portable Incubator", "Portable Freezer"), 1, N)) %>%
  mutate(N = ceiling(N)) %>%
  mutate(Cost = N*Price) %>%
  mutate(Priority = case_when(
    Name %in% purchase_list   ~ "Purchase",
    Name %in% equipment_maybe ~ "Maybe",
    Name %in% check_stock     ~ "Check Inventory"
  )) %>%
  mutate(Vendor = case_when(
    Manuf %in% c("IVYX Scientific", "ONT", "Zymo Research", "miniPCR", "Benchmark Scientific", "NEB") ~ Manuf,
    Manuf == "Invitrogen"         ~ "Thermofisher",
    Manuf == "Promega"            ~ "Fisher Scientific",
    Manuf == "coospider-repta"    ~ "Amazon"
      )
    ) %>%
  mutate(Purchase_with = if_else(
    Vendor %in% c("ONT", "IVYX Scientific", "Zymo Research", "miniPCR"), "P Card (5k limit)",
    "Eshop"
  )
    ) %>%
  select(
    Priority,
    Purchase_with,
    Vendor,
    Manuf,
    Name,
    Price,
    Cat,
    N,
    Cost,
    Link
  ) %>%
  arrange(Priority, Purchase_with, Vendor, Manuf)


purchase_by_mfr <- purchase %>%
  group_by(Vendor, Priority, Purchase_with) %>%
  summarize(Subtotal = sum(Cost)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from  = "Priority",
              values_from = "Subtotal",
              values_fill = 0) %>%
  select(Purchase_with,
         Vendor,
         Purchase, 
         Maybe, 
         Check_Inventory = "Check Inventory") %>%
  rowwise() %>%
  mutate(Total = sum(Maybe, Purchase, Check_Inventory)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  arrange(Purchase_with, Vendor, desc(Total))

```
